MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Warrender Park Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.32pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and further fault investigations required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.52pm on Wednesday 20th January 2021.
